message: Let's start fair. I'll take the lion's share, but you get a good starting point.
Alice, let's be realistic. I'm feeling generous, so I'll offer you a sizable chunk. Take it before inflation eats into your share too!
I'm willing to compromise, but I need a larger share to justify this game's inflation.  Let's split the difference from your last offer.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  Inflation is hurting me, but I'm willing to meet you near the middle ground. Take this offer before it's too late for both of us!
